name: The Cursed
description: For cursed factions that function as an organization, use the @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.sunderedislesoracles.c5abc14b60ea728e]{Organization Methods} or @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.sunderedislesoracles.d94642748c2feb36]{Organization Secrets} tables for additional details. To reveal a current goal for a cursed faction or its leaders, use the @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.sunderedislesoracles.56d013f94b60fbb9]{Cursed Character Goals} table. You can also give a cursed faction one or more @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.sunderedislesoracles.0c4ea61819a3090b]{Cursed Aspects}.
